communication

Interface UDP

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunicationAdapter, ListController, OmniRepository, OmniServer, StateAdapter, WaitAnswer, WaitAuthentication, WaitRequest

    public interface UDP
    - Interface UDP - This interface has every UDP communication method prototype needed in a class that implements TCP operations. Of course every method is supposed to be used as the user wants. Commentaries simply describe what they are intended to do when overriding it. This way we maintain a concise code. Created by Â©OmniBox on 01-11-2014.

                               java.io.IOException

        port - Destiny port
        size - Datagram package size

        java.lang.InterruptedException - If operation is interrupted

                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,

                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        Parameters:

        Received Request object
